description.line2: with a love for cats and the cosmos

quote.text: ‚ÄúWe will find a way. We always have.‚Äù

About.title: About Me
About.headline: With footsteps as gentle as a kitten‚Äôs and curiosity as vast as the cosmos, I approach software development with calm determination and a committed mindset.
About.description: I believe great code is crafted not only through logic but also with patience, empathy, and a deep understanding of what truly matters.

body.line1: I have hands-on experience in pet healthcare and fintech (insurtech) start-ups, where I developed scalable back-end systems and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver user-centred solutions.
body.line2: Before becoming a developer, I worked as a primary school teacher, which provided me with strong domain expertise in edtech and a deep understanding of learner needs.
body.line3: My main focus is back-end development using Java and Spring, with a particular interest in API design, system architecture, and building internal tools. I also enjoy front-end development and have contributed to projects using TypeScript and React.js, often taking on full-stack responsibilities.
body.line4: Within agile teams, I‚Äôve worked closely with engineers, product managers, designers, and marketers‚Äîfacilitating planning meetings, proposing improvements, and sharing ongoing feedback to enhance product quality. I also supported post-launch monitoring and iteration.
body.line5: From March 2024, I spent a year in Dublin, Ireland studying English. This experience strengthened my communication skills and fostered an open mindset through working with individuals from diverse cultural backgrounds.

line1.content: Co-translator of ‚ÄúHow to Learn to Code and Get a Developer Job‚Äù (2023) ‚Äì Volunteered with freeCodeCamp Korea to help translate the book as part of a 12-member team

line2.content: Volunteer translator at freeCodeCamp (2022) ‚Äì Translated Python tutorials to support Korean-speaking learners

line1.content: Speaker at GDG (Google Developers Group) Songdo DevFest (2023) ‚Äì Presented on ‚ÄúImproving Server Log Management for Junior Developers‚Äù

line2.content: Speaker at Seoul Women IT‚Äôs (2023) ‚Äì Shared my career transition story and community engagement experience

community.title: ü§ù Community Involvement & External Engagement
community.line1: Board Member at Girls in Tech Korea (2023‚Äì2024) ‚Äì Led tech seminars and mentorship programs in partnership with AWS Korea, EA Korea, and Trend Micro
community.line2: Evaluator at SW Gifted Creation Competition (2023), hosted by the Ministry of Science and ICT ‚Äì Assessed primary school division projects
community.line3: Candidate Assessor at DAY 1 COMPANY (2022‚Äì2023) ‚Äì Reviewed bootcamp applications and interviews as an external assessor
community.line4: Bootcamp Mentor at Code States (2022) ‚Äì Guided mentees with technical projects and career coaching
